job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: stronguAbout UsbrbrustrongAt Turquoise were making healthcare pricing simpler more transparent and lower cost for everyone Have you or a family member ever gotten an MRI or a lab or even a straightforward surgery without knowing the cost in advance Thats bonkers right Were going to fix thatbrbrWeve already launched our consumerfacing website that allows anyone to search and compare hospital insurance rates  something never before possible Now were rolling out a suite of new products for providers payers and patients to clean up the healthcare transaction We want to change how the industry works from the inside outbrbrWere a seedstage startup backed by top VCs More importantly were a multitalented group of folks moonlighting as authors bass players improv instructors chefs linguists and trivia buffs with a big passion for improving healthcare Were eager to find ambitious yet wellrounded teammates to join us on this missionbrbrstrongThe RolebrbrstrongWere looking for a driven entrepreneurial candidate that wants to impact healthcares broken payment infrastructure We value creative outsidethebox thinkers that back their ideas with revenue cycle expertise technical knowledge and action This role will be a key support function for a new product line and inform product development and feature releasesbrbrstrongIn this role you will brstrongul liBe a subject matter expert and internal thought leader for Turquoise Healths price transparency managed care rate benchmarking and contract management datali liArchitect solutions for ingesting large amounts of healthcare payments data  claims contract rates and demographics data to name a fewli liWrite and modify ingestion scripts in pythonli liExplore and evaluate new data sources to incorporate into our product to improve our customer experienceli liProvide client technical support as needed for our price transparency data productsli liModify and continue to improve our data warehouseli liHelp guide the data product roadmap with leadershipli liDraft internal and external technical documentation li liFluidly meet the sporadic daily tasks of a small growing startupli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul li3 years hospitalpayer contracting experience and demonstrated current revenue cycle industry knowledgeli li3 years experience writing python and SQLli liMedical billing and coding knowledge is a plusli liEntrepreneurial mindset you prioritize tasks with an eye for evolving business needs li liExpert communication of technical details in simple terms to clients and internal stakeholdersli liTeam player with zero egoli liAbility to work effectively in a remote environmentli liGood problemsolving skillsli liBachelors degree or equivalent experienceknowledge We are happy to work with strong candidates with nontraditional educational backgroundsli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liHealth Care Plan Medical Dental amp Visionli liUnlimited Time Offli li401K  Matchingli liFamily Leave Maternity Paternityli liWork From Homeli liStock Option Planli liMonthly Wellness Benefitli liAnnual Learning amp Development Benefitli brbrulstrongJob LocationbrbrstrongTurquoise Health is a fully remote company based in the US Our founding team is located in California San Diego and London We work with team members and contractors in the US and around the world but we operate on US business hours and work with clients entirely based in the USbrbrFor this role we are generally seeking USbased candidates but we are willing to consider strong candidates in other countries
